thread.title: Supreme Court cautious on new cases as term begins under cloud of vacancy politics
thread.title_full: Supreme Court cautious on new cases as term begins under cloud of vacancy politics | Fox News

author: tedteger
text:
Conservatives are frustrated that our ‘constitutional law professor’ president keeps winning at the Supreme Court. 
Every conservative ‘expert’ invited to appear on Fox stated as FACT that the Arizona immigration law would be found constitutional. “ It complements existing federal law…absolutely the Arizona law cannot be found unconstitutional since it agrees with federal law” 
What the Supreme Court decided: The Supremacy Clause gives Congress the power to preempt state law. 
And….Section 3 intrudes on the field of alien registration, a field in which Congress has left no room for States to regulate. ….Because Congress has occupied the field, even complementary state regulation is impermissible. 
Every conservative ‘expert’ invited to appear on Fox stated as FACT that Obama’s administrative action to simulate the Dream Act by directing funds towards pursuing thieves and drug offenders rather than deporting Mexican-born high school students was an unconstitutional power grab and would be found unconstitutional. 
What the Supreme Court decided: “Removal is a civil matter and one of its principal features is the broad discretion exercised by immigration officials, who must decide whether to pursue removal at all.” 
Every conservative ‘expert’ invited to appear on Fox stated as FACT that the health reform, and especially the individual mandate to buy insurance, is an unconstitutional power grab by the federal government and would be found unconstitutional. 
What the Supreme Court decided: The federal government has every right to impose the mandate under it’s taxing authority. 
Now the federal health exchanges were upheld and gay marriage was upheld. 
These self-proclaimed "constitution lovers" don't understand our constitution!
